1580630.name: Ingenious2
1580630.description:
Using Ingenious², users can write math and engineer calculations with a text editor, that automatically does all the calculations. You can export the calculations to PDF, HTML, C, C++, VBA (Visual Basic) code, Visual Studio Library (.lib) or even a standalone HTML5-app.
Features
  • Awesome source code editor with syntax highlighting and block selection
  • Use greek characters by typing a hashtag (#g becomes γ)
  • Use underscore in variable names for index-names
  • Easy and rich formating options for high quality prints
  • Calculate as you type - very fast development
  • Supports arrays
  • Rich math library included
  • Extend code using subroutines
  • Draw graphs in your calculations
  • Create tables just by using the TAB key
  • Plugins possible
  • Optional ribbon or toolbar interface
  • Export you calculation to a library (C++, VBA, ...). Define input and output variables.
